debian.cfinstall:
On Debian:

  __32-bit__:
    `$ curl -L -l cf-6.12.2.deb "https://cli.run.pivotal.io/stable?release=debian32&version=6.12.2&source=github-rel"`
    `$ sudo dpkg -i cf-6.12.2.deb`

  __64-bit__:
    `$ curl -L -l cf-6.12.2.deb "https://cli.run.pivotal.io/stable?release=debian64&version=6.12.2&source=github-rel"`
    `$ sudo dpkg -i cf-6.12.2.deb`

  __32-bit__:
    `$ curl -L -l cf-6.12.2.deb "https://cli.run.pivotal.io/stable?release=debian32&version=6.12.2&source=github-rel"`

ubuntu linux.cfinstall:
On Ubuntu:

  __32-bit__:
    `$ curl -L -l cf-6.12.2.deb "https://cli.run.pivotal.io/stable?release=debian32&version=6.12.2&source=github-rel"`

darwin.cfinstall:
on Mac OS X (64 bit):

    `$ curl -L -o cf-6.12.2.pkg "https://cli.run.pivotal.io/stable?release=macosx64&version=6.12.2&source=github-rel"`
    `$ open cf-6.12.2.pkg`

other.cfinstall: visit `https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases` in your browser, then download and install the appropriate `cf` binary for your platform.
